data.comment: The match is underway at St. Mary's Stadium.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Southampton.
Peter Bankes signals a Sheffield throw-in in Southampton's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Sheffield at St. Mary's Stadium.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 7, Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Sheffield at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Sheffield.
Free kick Southampton.
Sheffield's Billy Sharp gets in a shot on goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
In Southampton Southampton drive forward through Nathan Redmond. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Sheffield.
In the minute 17, Southampton have a goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a Southampton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Stuart Armstrong is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Stuart Armstrong is back on his feet again.
Southampton drive upfield and James Ward-Prowse gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
In the minute 24, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Sheffield drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 26, Southampton are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal! Sheffield have got their heads in front thanks to a John Lundstram strike.
Billy Sharp instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 28, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Che Adams (Southampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Peter Bankes awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Stuart Armstrong (Southampton) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by William Smallbone.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Sheffield.
John Lundstram for Sheffield drives towards goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Danny Ings (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Danny Ings (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 40, Peter Bankes signals a Southampton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Free kick Southampton.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 43, William Smallbone for Southampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Peter Bankes awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 44, Southampton are coming forward and Oriol Romeu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Southampton.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Oriol Romeu (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 48, Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Southampton.
Sheffield needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Southampton go level at 1-1 through Che Adams in Southampton.
In the minute 50, William Smallbone with an assist there.
Sheffield make their first substitution with Richairo Zivkovic replacing Oliver McBurnie.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Southampton.
In Southampton, Nathan Redmond of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 54, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 57, Southampton's William Smallbone breaks free at St. Mary's Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 58, Southampton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Che Adams (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 64, Sheffield will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Southampton.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 67, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Goal kick for Sheffield at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 70, Leon Clarke is on a sub for Billy Sharp for Sheffield.
Che Adams is on target to give Southampton a 2-1 advantage.
Southampton's Che Adams is whistled for offside at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 77, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Southampton drive upfield and James Ward-Prowse gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Oliver Norwood is replacing Chris Basham for the away team.
Peter Bankes signals a Southampton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
In the minute 81, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Southampton have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 84, Goal! The home team extend their lead to 3-1 thanks to a penalty from Danny Ings.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Shane Long is replacing Che Adams for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Southampton.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Southampton.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Peter Bankes will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick Southampton.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
The match has come to a close in Southampton. The final score is 3-1.
The home team replace Oriol Romeu with Michael Obafemi.
Enda Stevens (Sheffield) has received a first yellow card.
